1.content: First things first, who's gonna find our little guy?
1.title: Pick your character

11.content: When is the story going to take place?
11.title: Hanzo

112.content:
A shivering frost gnawed at your skin, causing your body to shiver and groan. Your mind was a slurry of confused, muddled thoughts and memories, the only focus being the icy ground below you. Your eyes attempted to flutter open, blistering winds forced them shut, your body fearing loss of vision in the unusually harsh wind.

The soft crunching of snow was heard from a near distance, approaching your quaking form, becoming louder, yet slower as the being advanced. With a moment of silence, your body was jarred as a warm, soft surface, carefully encompassed your body, bringing you close to the thick jacket the man wore.

---------------------------------------------------

Hanzo had recently been spending time in the frosty peaks of Nepal, avoiding the contact of most locals and the omnics which set temples here. He was merely training in the tundra to better adapt his skills in harsher conditions. His training session was harsh as always, the archer decked in casual wear, masking his appearance and confining his body to the warmth he radiated.

During his walk to another area to practice, the attuned eyes of the assassin spotted a small writhing form, laying atop the snow. He looked around quickly before approaching the creature, his steely eyes widening at the sight before him. A small human lay shivering in the snow, no more than 5 inches tall. He was dress in very simple streetwear, nothing wearable for the type of weather he had seemingly spawned into.

With a grunt, the large man carefully picked up the man and pulled him close to his warm chest. Hanzo was a trained assassin, he had done many horrendous things in his life. But he was not a monster, no matter how much he told himself he was.

"You're lucky I found you. You would have frozen, little one." Alone, the archer allowed himself to crack a small smile; possibly in hopes to comfort the small human who was just now opening his eyes, still shivering furiously. The look on Hanzo's face turned to one of though, for this training session, his pockets were filled with spare arrowheads, knives, shuriken and other sharp, dangerous or space-consuming objects. You were clearly freezing, so Hanzo need to think of where to place you.
112.title: Cold

choices: Hanzo arrives at the motel and pulls you out
Hanzo arrives at the motel and decides to keep you in there
1121.content:
With little choice, Hanzo sighed. "I'm sorry to do this little one, my pockets are filled with sharp instruments. I have to tuck you away somewhere more... Unconventional, until I arrive back to my motel room."

With a shivering nod, your eyes followed as the archer unzipped his thick jacket, allowing a wave of warmth assaults your body, holding a slightly sour tang. Your body begs for that warmth and is gifted more and the archer slowly and carefully pulls you under his shirt and towards the bare, damp flesh trap of his armpit. Your eyes widen as a thick, rank aura of b.o chokes your olfactory system; tainting your lungs with the sour pong of a hardworking man.

You had just met Hanzo, but his willingness to help you sparked trust for him to you. He seemed hesitant to do this, so there must not have been really another choice. Slowly, you were pressed against the shaved flesh, moist with sweat and grime. The reeking scent encapsulated you as you felt the arm lower and heard the sound of the jacket being rezipped.

"Sorry again, little one, but this will keep you warm." The archer wouldn't admit it immediately, but the feeling of a micro human trapped in an overworked part of his body was something he couldn't help but adore. His humanity and morality still existed, so the idea of torturing the small human was out of the question, but could playing around be so bad? The more he thought about it, the more ideas sprouted to the assassin's mind, the stern, cold warrior nigh giddy at the thought of playing with the smaller man. But perhaps first he should befriend him, a micro in a world like this would be outcast, maybe this was someone Hanzo needed. The start he needed to forgive the ghosts of his past.
1121.title: Possibility for Forgiveness

The gunslinger sighed as he gyrated his ass with a mischevious intent. Your body was mesmerized by the damp crevice you were trapped in, the feeling of wiry hairs, dampened by stale and fresh sweat. The scent was powerful, a deep musky stench that oozed strength and the epitome of manliness at its core. Undertones of the sour, salty B.O is what kept you from falling asleep in the warm, cushiony crack; every ounce of tiredness being smack away by faux smelling salts.

He explained, his southern drawl sending a shiver through you. It was your only distraction, however, before you would realize what he had meant by that. But by that time, it was too late; not that you could have done something in the first place.

The growling grew, still quiet and mostly felt through the vibrations. With the little light you had, you watched, mesmerised as the wrinkled hole pulsated and grew before you. 141.content:
You couldn't quite remember how you got there, all you know is that everything is huge. You were in a locker room when you hear voices approaching. A few recruites entered. Hoping they might help you you jumped to get their attention. They notice you, but unfortunatly helping you is the last thing they intended. One of them grabs you and carries you over to the commanders shoes. "Hope you don't mind the smell, because knowing you have it worse than us will make the drill much more bearable"

Without any more acknowledgement you are dropped in Commander Morrison's shoes. Not even a second after none other than Jack Morrison came in, seeing the recruits near his shoes "What are you doing there?". The recruits panic for a moment then one says "With all due respect, your shoes reek and we dared Jeff here to take a deep sniff" "Keep your antics for your free hours, let's go get on with the training."

During their exchqnge you were trying and failing to get out of the shoe, suddenly you saw Jack's foot coming in and smothering you hard. Every step he took is painful and yiu know it is only the beginning. "Let's warm up with some running" these words struck fear in you heart. The moment Jack started running in front of the recruits, his steps became much harder and his feet started getting sweaty. Unfortunaltly for you Jack really values cardio and the running continues for an hour, each and every step flattening you further into the sole. Jack is completly unaware how much he is torturing you, but some of recruits that put you in this nightmarish situation are just fixated on the feet of their commander, imagining how you are trapped beneath Jack's sweaty feet feeling the ful weight of every step.

The running was followed by juming jacks. You didn't know there was anything worse than being trampled by sweaty feet, but now you know being jumped on full force is much worse. Luckily the training ended after the juming jacks, but your torture isn't over yet. Almost all the recruits forgot about you after the though training, and the few that still remember you couldn't be bothered to stop your torture.

As Jack took off the first shoe the smell hit him, he would never admid it but he liked how smelly his feet would get after a good training. Still not being aware of your pathetic existence under his other foot, he took a sniff after all the recruits left "the boys are right, my feet reek". When he took off the shoe with you inside you realize that you are stuck to his sweaty sock and end up in his regular shoes, you were surprised Jack didn't change sock. You hoped that Jack would notice you, but to your dismay he was none the wiser. Jack made his way down the many hallways of the overwatch base toward...
141.title: pranked

choices: He thought you were a dream

Jack drank and drank, then to your horror Jack seemed to like the next song a little too much, because he jumped from his chair and made his way to the dancefloor. Your next few hours were spent being stepped and jumped on by a completly unaware Jack. The dancing makes Jack's feet sweat even more and you are reminded of the training from this afternoon. Finally the dancing found an end and Jack was brought home by the others.

In Jack's room you fell to the floor and were utterly exposed. "Hey there little guy, were you in my boot the whole evening?" Not waiting for your answer he continued "The night is conna be cold, how about we put you in my sock, it might smell a little but at least it is warm" Jack couldn't help but giggle when he grabbed your puny body and put you in his sock. 1522.content:
You found yourself on the floor of what seemed to be an huge building. The floor is hard and cold.
Suddenly you hear heavy footsteps approaching. The one making the noise was no one other than Gabriel Reyes the Commander of Blackwatch, and it seems he wasn't in a good mood. You hoped he would simply walk by, since you couldn't expect much help from a giant in such a foul mood, but fate wasn't on your side and he stopped right in front of you. You could feel his eyes looking down on you and you couldn't help but feel nervous about the smile that starts to form in his face.
He picks you up and take you to his office to avoid someone else seeing you.

"It seems you aren't very lucky. I am one of the worst possible people to find you, from now on you life will be in my control." After saying this he thinks about what to do to you first...

info.brief_description: A male character gets shrunk and captured by one of the guys from Overwatch.
info.description:
A new GT interactive for all of the Overwatch fans out there.

~Rules~

1. Only male characters.
2. The interactive is 18+, so there may be sexual themes.
3. OOC allowed.
4. Characters can die.
5. The Overwatch guys can grow.

The main OC character's name and background may be different depending on the macro character and setting.
